user.title: CityBikes Network
user.description: Select a bike share network from the list.

radius.title: Filter by radius
radius.description: Select your location on the map and set a radius (in meters) to filter stations. Default radius is 1000 meters.

stations.title: Which station to monitor
stations.description: Configure which stations to monitor for {network}{radius}. Found {count} station(s).

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to CityBikes API
error.no_stations_selected: Please select at least one station or enable 'All stations'
